I just beat it because I wanted to uninstall it to get some space on my hard drive. It's not a bad game, but I can't shake the feeling that the first game was so much better. I will keep it for now just because of the workshop chambers (have only tried one but they have potential to be much better than the story chambers). Overall it just felt too easy and there were moments where I was stuck because there wasn't a clear sense of direction or progress within the level. Also, was the first Portal so load screen heavy?

Portal 2 continues and even upgrades already excellent experience. this puzzle solving game delivers both thrilling storyline and innovative gameplay that we already saw in the first part. I cannot reccomend this game more, worth it at full price and a steal during a sale.

Das Spiel hat ein tolles Puzzlesystem und bietet viele Möglichkeiten die eigene Kreativität zu entfalten.
Abgesehen von dem ist der Storymodus sehr gut gemacht.
今年玩游戏的时间不多机子也带不动很多库里的东西，就尝试玩玩这款老游戏。无愧是经典之作！很棒的游戏体验和不错的剧情。双人模式也很欢乐。

Der Koop-Modus macht wirklich viel Spaß und die Rätsel sind teilweise knifflig, aber lösbar. Javis (die Computerstimme) hat ziemlich "flotte" Sprüche drauf & lockert das Ganze schön auf. 
Wirklich sehr schön gemacht!

Já tinha jogado no Xbox e decidi pegar para o PC também. O que posso dizer? FANTÁSTICO! Esse jogo é incrível e com uma história muito envolvente que da vontade de zerar mais de 1 vez. Gráficos lindos e uma trilha sonora adequada e incrível! E como se isso não fosse o suficiente, ainda trás um multiplayer super divertido. Recomendo muito!
How do you know that I've played this game for 25 hours when I have just purchased this are you spying on me

[h1] Джентльмены, добро пожаловать в Лабораторию исследования природы порталов. Астронавты, герои войны, олимпийцы... вы здесь потому, что нам нужны самые лучшие. Итак, кто готов заняться наукой?[/h1]
Эта игра - шедевр. Вас на протяжении 10 часов будут унижать и ставить вам неудовлетворительные оценки в бланках, которые существуют вне времени и пространства.
Также, помимо режима для людей без друзей (или с бедными друзьями) есть кооператив.
